name: The Lost Dozen Demo
description:
The Lost Dozen is a 2D platformer set in the future where donuts have taken over the world.

This is a very early demo so some things don't work yet.

Just updated and fixed some stuff! Enjoy!

More updates coming soon!

Controls:

Controller (Xbox)

Movement: D-pad

Jump: A

Attack: X

Dash (when unlocked): B

To restart the game, press start and back together.

Keyboard

Movement: Arrow keys

Jump: Z

Attack: C

Dash (when unlocked): X

To restart the game press F5.

Controller (Classic PC)

Movement: D-pad

Jump: button 2

Attack: button 3

Dash (when unlocked): button 1

To restart the game, press button 10 and button 9 together.
